channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup - September 20, 2019
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-september-20-2019) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
Don't miss the **special announcement** section this week, especially if you've ever wanted to enjoy the recorded Gauntlet Hangouts sessions in an audio podcast!
Thanks to everyone who facilitated and played, and if you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://discourse.funtimers.club/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
